channel.title: Hardware on Development Cheat Sheets
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on Development Cheat Sheets

item.title: Broadlink (Black Bean) Devices
item.description: The Broadlink (RM Mini) black bean is a small universal Infra Red (IR) remote control which connects to and receives commands over WiFi.

item.title: Raspberry Pi
item.description: The Raspberry Pi is a series of small single-board computers (SBCs) developed in the United Kingdom by the Raspberry Pi Foundation in association with Broadcom.
